description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Noodle Salad With Peanut Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chicken Noodle Salad With Peanut Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare noodles following packet instructions. Drain. Refresh under cold water, drain. Place in a large bowl and cut into 10cm lengths.
Add lettuce, coleslaw, onion, capsicum, chicken and half the coriander to noodles. Toss to combine and season to taste.

Whisk peanut butter, vinegar, lime juice, oil, soy sauce, sugar, chilli flakes and 2 tbs water in a jug, adding a little more water if dressing is too thick. Pour dressing over noodle salad and toss to combine. To serve, scatter with peanuts and remaining coriander.
